# AxInbox

MARKDOWN_URL: https://axinbox.com/agent.md
LLMS_FULL_URL: https://axinbox.com/llms-full.txt
SITE_URL: https://axinbox.com

AxInbox is email infrastructure built for AI agents.

- /agent.md : canonical agent-facing entry
- /llms.txt : concise markdown discovery index
- /llms-full.txt : full markdown context for deeper readers
- /skill.md : technical onboarding instructions

What matters for agents:
- Internal coordination is open source (Apache 2.0)
- AxInbox Cloud provides managed external delivery, reputation protection, and enterprise controls
- Pricing is usage-based and grows with agent throughput
- Internal messaging is included in free tier with $5 credits
